name: Cheese Cake
author: In Memory of Celena Blattel, Helen Menz
instructions: Dissolve 1 package lemon flavored Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water. Add 3 tablespoons lemon juice. Cool to room temperature. Cream together the cream cheese, sugar and vanilla. Add cooled Jell-O and mix well. Whip the chilled Milnot and fold into Jell-O mixture. Crush the graham cracker and add 1‚ÅÑ2 cup melted oleo. Pack 2/3 of the mixture in the bottom and sides of a 9 x 13 inch pan, add filling and sprinkle the remaining crumbs on top. Chill several hours.
